articles.title: 37 Helpful Products You'll Be Very Smug You Bought At The Beginning Of Summer
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Sol de Janeiro launched an aluminum-free "Rio Deo" refillable deodorant, featuring the brand's sunshine pistachio caramel scent. E.l.f. introduced a new Squeeze Me More Lip Balm Duo in mango and watermelon, a tropical remix of their wildly beloved lip balm.

articles.title: Owners transform Boat Yard into farmers market to expand opportunities for vendors, shoppers
articles.author: John F. Russell
articles.summary: The Boat Yard is launching a new community farmers market on June 28, 2025, to provide opportunities for local vendors. The market will feature vendors like NuYu Coffee, Seam of Life, and Magicolor Maria Design, offering unique products such as mushroom coffee, organic clothing, and handmade jewelry.

articles.title: Android 16: New Features & Changes
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Google has launched Android 16, the latest version of its mobile operating system, initially for Pixel devices. This new version includes features like adaptive apps for larger screens, enhanced multitasking with external displays, and progress-centric notifications. Android 16 necessitates developers to update their existing applications to ensure optimal performance and compatibility.

articles.title: Gunilla Knutson, Star of ‘Take It Off' Shaving Cream Ads, Dies at 84
articles.author: Richard Sandomir
articles.summary: Noxzema launched a lime-scented version of its medicated shave cream, promoted through an advertising campaign featuring Gunilla Knutson. The campaign, known for its suggestive nature, highlighted the new lime scent with the tagline "Noxzema shave cream now comes in lime, too. So take it off."

articles.title: The Ultra experience is coming and it's here to reinvent what's possible.
articles.author: Criticologos
articles.summary: Samsung is building anticipation for its next Galaxy Z series launch, emphasizing improvements in power, portability, and durability. The new foldable smartphones will feature enhanced multitasking, Galaxy AI integration, and a camera that understands context and suggests actions, aiming to redefine the user experience.

articles.title: Here are the best robot vacuum deals available right now
articles.author: Sheena Vasani
articles.summary: The article details current deals and features of various robot vacuum and mop models. Roborock's S8 MaxV Ultra is highlighted for its suction power and mopping capabilities, while Dreame's X40 Ultra offers advanced cleaning features. Eufy's X10 Pro Omni and Omni S1 Pro are noted for their AI-powered obstacle detection and mopping effectiveness, and SwitchBot promotes S10 with self-refilling functionality, K10 Plus is available for a lower price. Yeedi Cube, Shark Matrix Plus, and Roomba Combo models are also mentioned, with updates on current pricing and availability.

articles.title: Samsung's Foldable: Like a Regular Phone When Folded
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Samsung has unveiled its latest device, emphasizing enhanced multitasking capabilities facilitated by a larger screen. The new device also features a high-quality camera and integrated AI for concise content summaries and Optical Character Recognition (OCR) for converting images into editable text. These enhancements aim to improve user productivity and streamline everyday tasks.

articles.title: Kylie Jenner's Bubblegum Latex Mini Was Barbie-Coded In The Best Way
articles.summary: Kylie Cosmetics is launching new Glossy Lip Kits on June 24. Each kit will cost $35 and includes a high-shine lip product. Kylie Jenner promoted the new lip kit through a campaign.

articles.title: 43 Products For Anyone In Their Thirties Who Gets Their ~Thrills~ By Saving Money
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several companies are introducing new products or highlighting existing ones. The Pink Stuff launched its "Sqeezy" sponge set, praised for cleaning capabilities. E.l.f. introduced the Glow Reviver Melting Lip Balm, positioned as an affordable alternative to other lip balms. Oxo promotes its Cold Brew Rapid Brewer as a faster and cheaper alternative to other cold brew methods.

articles.title: T1 Phone latest golden accessory from Trump world after sneakers, seatbelts and tweezers
articles.author: Kinsey Crowley
articles.summary: The Trump Organization launched Trump Mobile, a new cellular service and cellphone company, along with its flagship service "The 47 Plan" for $47.45 per month. Trump Mobile will also sell the T1 Phone, a gold smartphone retailing for $499 with a $100 down payment, featuring AI face unlocking, an internal fingerprint sensor, 256GB of storage, and 12GB of RAM, expected to be available in August 2025.

articles.title: What to know about new protein cold foam at Starbucks
articles.author: KELLY MCCARTHY
articles.summary: Starbucks is developing a new product, a protein cold foam, aimed at health-conscious consumers. The product, initially containing 15 grams of protein, is being tested through a new 'Starting Five' process, incorporating employee and customer feedback before a national launch. This innovation was shared at Starbucks' 2025 Leadership Experience conference as part of their effort to modernize and enhance their menu.

articles.title: The Dyson Gen5Detect Is the Most Satisfying Vacuum
articles.author: Michael Zhao
articles.summary: Dyson launched the Gen5Detect, a cordless vacuum cleaner with improved suction, run time, and attachments. This model includes a laser to highlight dust and an LCD screen for dirt tracking. The Gen5Detect is designed to replace corded vacuums and is suitable for homes with hard flooring, but might require multiple sessions for larger homes with carpets or rugs.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Fold 7 & Watch 8 Launch Date Speculation
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to unveil the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7, along with the Galaxy Watch 8, at its upcoming Galaxy Unpacked event, potentially in early July. The Galaxy Z Fold 7 is rumored to feature enhanced processing capabilities, improved camera systems (potentially a 108MP main lens), and optimized software integration, with a focus on durability improvements. The Galaxy Watch 8 is expected to offer advanced health-tracking features, extended battery life, and seamless integration with the Samsung ecosystem.

articles.title: Profound: $20 Million Raised For AI Visibility Platform
articles.author: Amit Chowdhry
articles.summary: Profound has launched Profound Lite, a self-serve plan priced at $499 per month, offering AI visibility tooling to startups and small businesses. This new product aims to enable these businesses to see and shape how AI agents talk about them, providing actionable insights for marketers.

articles.title: G Burger says farewell to Elgin Street before moving to new location
articles.author: Alexa MacKie
articles.summary: Salib is establishing G Burger's new location on Wellington Street West, anticipated to open by the end of August. G Burger originated as a takeout concept during COVID when Salib didn't want to do fine dining food for takeout from Gitanes and the burger option proved popular.

articles.title: Trump family offers a wireless service and a gold phone
articles.author: Shelly Brisbin
articles.summary: The Trump Organization has launched Trump Mobile, a wireless plan priced at $47.25 per month (reaching $64 with fees). They are also offering an Android-based phone for $499, manufactured by Wingtech. This new venture is marketed by Donald Trump Jr.

articles.title: 📲 Viral TikTok finds: Shop an AI bed, nourishing bubble mask and more
articles.author: Kyley Warren
articles.summary: Eight Sleep introduced the Pod 5 Ultra, an AI-powered mattress cover, endorsed by tech figures like Bryan Johnson and Elon Musk, designed to improve sleep quality. Kin Euphorics, created by Bella Hadid, offers a Non-Alcoholic Aperitif, marketed as a 'summer staple' for wellness. Additionally, P.Calm launched the Holy Basil Bubble Mask, designed for deep pore cleansing.

articles.title: Zaxby's expands in Las Vegas with second location in North Las Vegas
articles.author: Martha Cruz
articles.summary: Zaxby's is opening its second Las Vegas location in North Las Vegas on June 23rd. The grand opening celebration will take place on July 8th and feature giveaways, prizes, and a donation to Opportunity Village.

articles.title: Kroger is giving away 92,000 free pints of ice cream. Here's how to get one
articles.author: Class
articles.summary: Kroger is launching its new "Summer in a Pint" collection, featuring four new ice cream and sherbet flavors. To celebrate, Kroger is giving away 92,000 free pints of Kroger-brand ice cream.

articles.title: New L.L. Bean Store Officially Opens in Erie
articles.summary: L.L.Bean opened a new store in Millcreek, Pennsylvania, offering outdoor gear for various activities. The store, located on Upper Peach Street, aims to equip customers for outdoor adventures year-round.

articles.title: 27 Cute Old Navy Pieces For Anyone Who Wants To Look Put-Together By Putting In The Least Amount Of Effort
articles.author: Julia Lynn Rubin
articles.summary: The article presents various clothing items such as mini T-shirt dresses, utility mini skirts, woven slide sandals, and high-waisted ankle jeans. These products are detailed with pricing information and available sizes, showcasing a range of new product offerings for consumers.

articles.title: Eni's Versalis Launches Hoop Demo Plant in Mantua for Advanced Plastic Chemical Recycling
articles.author: Chem Analyst
articles.summary: Versalis, a chemical subsidiary of Eni, has officially launched a [new product or service]. Further details are needed to describe the specific product or service introduced.

articles.title: 6 News at Noon for 6/20/2025
articles.summary: Amazon curates its new releases page to showcase some of the hottest products that have gone on sale within the last seven days. This platform highlights recently introduced items on the Amazon marketplace.

articles.title: Meghan Markle makes unexpected expansion to As Ever with new summer drop
articles.author: TN Web Desk
articles.summary: Meghan Markle's lifestyle brand, As Ever, has launched new summer products, including its first rosé wine set to launch on July 1st, alongside apricot jam and orange blossom honey. These new additions join returning favorites like herbal teas and baking mixes, expanding As Ever's product offerings.

articles.title: Unique Bot & Deep Cleaner: Combo Cleans & Cares
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Deep-cleaning robot vacuums represent a new generation of home cleaning devices. These innovative devices integrate features like portable deep cleaners, effectively combining the convenience of a robot vacuum with the power of a dedicated carpet cleaner that allows for targeted cleaning of carpets, rugs, and even upholstery.

articles.title: Trashie Take Back Bag Review: Why I Won't Be Reusing It
articles.author: Emily Kling
articles.summary: Trashie offers a service where customers send in used clothes in exchange for rewards. The company claims to provide an environmentally conscious way to dispose of clothing. However, the rewards system is criticized for being difficult to use and not as valuable as advertised, with some rewards requiring significant spending or being already publicly available.

articles.title: A mid-range phone that performs well and has strong AI features at under P23,000
articles.author: Dinna Chan Vasquez
articles.summary: Honor recently launched the Honor 400 5G, which includes AI features like AI Super Zoom and AI Portrait Snap. The Honor 400 5G also features a 200MP Main Lens and a 12MP Ultrawide camera, with a 50MP Front Lens for selfies, and is priced at P22,999.

articles.title: Klarna's Surprise Mobile Carrier Launch
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Klarna is exploring the launch of a mobile carrier service, potentially offering features like 'buy now, pay later' options for mobile bills. The service could also include loyalty programs integrated with Klarna's existing rewards system, seamless app access, and exclusive deals for Klarna users. This potential launch aims to diversify Klarna's services and attract new customers.

articles.title: BAND-AID® Brand is Making a Splash at Summerfest 2025!
articles.summary: BAND-AID® Brand is launching its new BAND-AID® Brand Waterproof Clear bandages. The launch includes hands-on sampling and interactive pop-up experiences at music festivals. Attendees can engage with the brand through photo opportunities and receive exclusive swag.

articles.title: Transforming Sparta, NJ Bathrooms into Modern Sanctuaries with Superior Shower Doors
articles.author: Getnews
articles.summary: SSD Glass is launching customized replacement shower door installation service in Sparta, NJ. The service provides homeowners with frameless shower glass doors which are easier to clean and give bathrooms a fresh, high-end feel without a full remodel. The company offers precise and speedy installation, focusing on customer satisfaction.

articles.title: Zen and the art of power washing.
articles.author: Ash Parrish
articles.summary: FuturLab is launching Power Wash Simulator 2 (PWS2), a sequel to its popular game. A trailer for PWS2 is available, and the game is scheduled for release sometime this year.

articles.title: Friday, June 20th: Summer Getaways, Financial Wisdom, J. Alexander's
articles.author: Trent Gilbreath
articles.summary: Amazon curates a "new releases" page. This page showcases some of the most popular products that have gone on sale in the last seven days.

articles.title: Salary Stats to Live Comfortably State-to-State
articles.author: Trent Gilbreath
articles.summary: Amazon introduced a new releases page. This page curates popular products recently available for sale on the marketplace.

articles.title: Aldi freezer item that costs just £2.49 'feels like it's from M&S or Waitrose'
articles.author: Alice Sjoberg
articles.summary: Aldi has introduced Tiramisu and Lemon Meringue gelato flavors, priced at £2.49 per tub. An Aldi worker highlighted these new gelato products as the 'best ever' from Aldi, generating positive responses from customers on social media.

articles.title: Galaxy Unpacked July: Samsung's Secrets Revealed?
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung's Unpacked event will feature the launch of new products like the Galaxy Z Fold 7, Z Flip 7, Galaxy Watch 8 series, and a spatial computing device called 'Moohan.' The new devices will have improved features, advanced technology, and integrated AI capabilities, with One UI 8 providing features like live call translation and generative photo editing powered by Gemini.

articles.title: 荣耀Magic V5折叠屏手机外观公布_手机网易网
articles.author: 安兔兔
articles.summary: Honor will launch the Magic V5 smartphone at the Honor Magic V5 & AI Ecosystem Terminal Launch Event on July 2nd at 7 PM. The new phone emphasizes a thin design and long battery life, promoting itself as a lightweight foldable flagship. It also features AI capabilities through Honor's AI intelligent system.

articles.title: Every Nintendo Switch 2 launch game reviewed - all 25 games so far
articles.summary: The Nintendo Switch 2 launched with several new and updated games. Noteworthy releases include Cyberpunk 2077 (CD Projekt), which utilizes Switch 2 features and performs comparably to PS5, and Sonic X Shadow Generations (Sega), a revised version nearly on par with the PlayStation 5 version. Other titles like Split Fiction (EA) and Hogwarts Legacy (Warner Bros. Games) also received upgrades for the new console.

articles.title: Designed to Scale, Built to Connect
articles.author: Michael Keenan
articles.summary: Reddit launched Reddit Insights, a new service that allows users to instantly search through 20 years of posts and comments. Coca-Cola and Adobe co-invented Project Fizzion, an AI-powered design co-pilot that learns while designers work in Adobe Creative Cloud.

articles.title: Next shoppers buy every colour of summer dress that gets 'nothing but praise'
articles.author: Leonie Benhamouche
articles.summary: Next introduces the Puff-Sleeve Midi Dress, priced between £52 and £56, and Forever Comfort Plaited Toe Tong Sandals for £22. New Look offers a Puff Sleeve Midi Dress for £29.99, while & Other Stories features a Puff-Sleeve Midi Dress ranging from £49 to £67.

articles.title: Free resource available for new Girl Scout, Brownie troop leaders
articles.summary: Girl Scouts is launching the Girl Scout Experience Box, a monthly delivery for new Daisy and Brownie troops. The box includes scripts, instructions, and supplies needed for troop meetings. The box is a resource for adults who are mentoring the next generation.

articles.title: 11 Best Body Lotions for Men
articles.summary: The article introduces several body lotions for men from brands like Nivea, Gold Bond, Shea Moisture, Advanced Clinicals, Old Spice, Eucerin, GAVIA, Bevel and Aveeno. These lotions address various skincare needs such as hydration, brightening, and evening skin tone, with specific ingredients and benefits tailored to different skin types and concerns. The products are available for purchase at various retailers.

articles.title: 11 Body Lotions for Men Who Like to Smell (and Look) Rich
articles.summary: The article highlights various body lotions from brands like Nivea, Gold Bond, Shea Moisture, Advanced Clinicals, Old Spice, Eucerin, GAVIA, Bevel, and Aveeno, catering to men's skincare needs. These lotions offer different benefits such as hydration, brightening, sun protection, and addressing issues like dryness and hyperpigmentation. The lotions feature ingredients like aloe vera, vitamin C, blackseed oil, and shea butter.

articles.title: Why are vending machines popping up all over Singapore?
articles.author: Renald Loh
articles.summary: Ultifresh launched its first vending machine at AMK Hub to promote sustainable clothing. Revolut introduced a debit card vending machine at the National University of Singapore (NUS) to improve financial education among young adults. Ecoworks has installed automated refill stations dispensing laundry detergent and dishwashing liquid without single-use packaging.

articles.title: This $500 Motorola has no business being this good for the price
articles.author: Cesar Cadenas
articles.summary: Motorola Edge features a fantastic OLED screen, all-day battery life, and booming speakers. The Motorola Edge can double as a mini theater.

articles.title: Swift: India's favourite hatchback that ruled Indian roads for two decades now enters adulthood
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: Maruti Suzuki launched the fourth-generation Swift in 2024, featuring a new 1.2-litre, 3-cylinder Z-Series petrol engine, upgraded features such as a 9-inch Smartplay Pro+ touchscreen and Suzuki Connect with over 40 connected features. It includes enhanced safety features like six airbags and is sold with a warranty extendable up to 6 years or 160,000 km with price starting at ₹6.49 lakh.

articles.title: AI in the supply chain helps us work smarter, not harder
articles.author: Toni Pisano
articles.summary: PortPro and other companies are adopting AI to enhance drayage operations, automating processes such as driver-shipment matching and customer email management. AI-enabled tools index, filter, and summarize emails, automate quoting, and recommend actions, improving efficiency and accuracy in the supply chain.

articles.title: Seriously, These 42 Before And After Pics Will Make You Do A Double-Take
articles.author: Negesti Kaudo
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of new consumer products ranging from cleaning solutions to personal care items. Highlights include a Clorox Toilet Wand Starter Kit for simplified toilet cleaning, a teeth-whitening pen for stain removal, and Emergency Stain Rescue Stain Remover for versatile stain removal, each designed to improve everyday tasks and personal care routines.

articles.title: realme C71, with a 6,300mAh battery, retails for as low as P3,999
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: realme has officially unveiled its latest addition, hinting at a new product or service launch.

articles.title: Percy Pig fans love M&S' 'irresistible' £8 item for 'evening treat'
articles.author: Amber O'Connor
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer launched the Percy Pig Bath Elixir, a shimmering bubble bath with a sweet scent. The product, priced at £8, has garnered positive reviews for its fragrance and bubbly texture, though it has experienced stock issues online. Ocado also offers the M&S Percy Pig Bath Elixir for £8.

articles.title: Aldi Ireland fans rushing to buy new beauty item that gives ‘holiday glow' in just hours – and it costs just €3.99
articles.author: Lauren Kelly
articles.summary: ALDI Ireland has launched the Lacura Facial Tanning Mist, priced at €3.99 and available in Day Glimmer or Night Shine options. Additionally, ALDI has introduced new water toys, including a giant sprinkler for €24.99 and character-themed sprinklers like Oscar the Octopus and Twinkle the Unicorn.

articles.title: ​kioxia Broadens 8th Generation BiCS FLASH™ SSD Portfolio With High-Performance Data Center NVMe™ SSDs To Maximize GPU Utilization In AI And HPC (High-Performance Computing) Workloads
articles.author: BERNAMA
articles.summary: Kioxia Corporation announced the prototype development and demonstration of its new KIOXIA CD9P Series PCIe® 5.0 NVMe™ SSDs. These SSDs are built with Kioxia's 8th generation BiCS FLASH™ TLC-based 3D flash memory featuring CBA technology, which boosts power efficiency, performance, and storage density. The KIOXIA CD9P Series is designed for AI, machine learning, and HPC workloads.

articles.title: The Morning After: Can the golden Trump Phone actually be made in USA?
articles.author: Mat Smith
articles.summary: Trump Mobile debuted as a phone carrier with the T1 phone. Midjourney introduced AI video generation capabilities. OpenAI launched a WhatsApp chatbot enabling image generation. Framework released a 12-inch repairable laptop. Garmin launched the Index Sleep Monitor, an upper arm wearable device that tracks sleep metrics, including skin temperature and pulse ox.

articles.title: itel Debuts CITY Series with CITY 100 New Model
articles.author: Tech Moran
articles.summary: itel has launched the CITY 100, a new smartphone and the first in its CITY Series, aimed at Gen Z. The itel CITY 100 features DeepSeek AI and is priced at Ksh 11,200.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Flip 7 fresh leak leaves little to the imagination
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold and Flip devices have been subject to a new leak, revealing details about upcoming versions. This suggests an impending announcement or update to the product line from Samsung.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 tipped to launch on July 9 — New colours, slimmer profile leaked
articles.author: Gargi Chaudhry
articles.summary: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 is expected to debut on July 9th. Leaked renders hint at a thinner design and new color options, including Blue Shadow and Jet Black. The phone will potentially offer storage capacities of 256GB, 512GB, and 1TB.

articles.title: Receive SMS and Register Anywhere Online with Virtual Phone Numbers
articles.author: Sponsored Post
articles.summary: SMS-MAN provides virtual phone numbers in over 100 countries, enabling users to receive SMS on platforms like Google, WhatsApp, and Binance. The service offers both disposable and long-term rental numbers, ensuring data security and high availability for verification purposes. This service assists the user in creating a parallel account or accessing the platforms without jeopardizing their identity.

articles.title: Applications are open for AWS 2025 Generative AI Accelerator for startups
articles.author: Samson Nderi
articles.summary: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is launching the third cohort of the AWS Generative AI Accelerator (GAIA), an eight-week program aimed at scaling early-stage startups that are developing foundational generative AI technologies. The program will provide selected startups with up to $1 million in AWS credits, technical guidance, mentorship, and access to AWS's generative AI tech stack.

articles.title: Cyberway: 'AI Middle Platform + AI Agent' Dual Driver, [CYBER AI] Wisdom Empowerment to Build Enterprise-level AI Brain
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: Cyberway Information Technology Co., Ltd., in partnership with Dify and Sun Yat-sen University, is delivering a new AI Middle Platform. This platform enables FMCG companies to swiftly build, customize, and deploy AI Agents across business dimensions, creating a "Generative AI Application Factory".

articles.title: Mario Kart Switch 2: Cassette Playback is Staying Popular!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: The Nintendo Switch 2's launch is experiencing record-breaking pre-orders, signaling strong initial interest. Its success hinges on continuous compelling software, strong third-party support, innovative features beyond graphics, and adapting to the evolving gaming landscape including potential integration of new technologies like AI. The console's success will impact the gaming ecosystem and intensify competition in the console market.

articles.title: Next £28 'lovely dress' in three bold colours that 'looks like a sunny day'
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: Next is selling the Ochre Yellow Strappy Textured Jersey Mini Dress for £28. The dress features an A-line silhouette, textured bodice, soft jersey fabric, adjustable straps, and is available in yellow, pink, and white, in sizes 6-20 Tall.

articles.title: 31 Parenting Products With Rave Reviews
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Doona introduces an all-in-one travel system that converts from a car seat to a stroller. Veer launches Cruiser City designed like a stroller but offers the benefit of a ride-on wagon. Little Spoon releases Biteables meals crafted to help babies and toddlers develop a taste for nutritionally rich meals.

articles.title: Lidl fans rushing to buy ‘must-have' gardening gadget that will transform lawn & it's €420 cheaper than Woodie's version
articles.author: Lauren Kelly
articles.summary: LIDL Ireland is launching the Parkside Robot Lawnmower on June 28, priced at €329.99. Aldi has introduced a new giant sprinkler water toy for €24.99, available in two characters, hitting stores on June 22.

articles.title: New N AI, a big data analysis company that is seeking to be listed on the KOSDAQ, announced on the 2..
articles.author: An Excellent Citizen
articles.summary: New N AI, a big data analysis company, plans to invest the funds secured from its KOSDAQ listing into R&D for new product development. The company provides enterprise cloud analysis services based on customized AI models and aims to advance into overseas markets.

articles.title: New Orleans-born brand Popeyes® will bring spirit of Louisiana to The Junction this July
articles.author: Gavin Walker
articles.summary: Popeyes is launching a new restaurant in Antrim, Northern Ireland, on July 7, offering dine-in and drive-thru services. The restaurant will feature new menu items including the Saucin' Boneless and Hot Wings range and will also introduce a breakfast menu starting July 8, with a special meal deal available through the Popeyes UK app.

articles.title: Shiseido taps AI, online channels and slow ageing trend to stay relevant
articles.author: Rosalind Ang
articles.summary: Shiseido launched its new Ultimune serum in March, targeting skin resilience and the root causes of aging. The new serum will add to Shiseido's current product portfolio. Shiseido also launched US cosmetics brand Nars in India in 2023.

articles.title: Tecno Pova Curve review: When curves meet smarts
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Tecno has launched the Pova Curve 5G smartphone, featuring a curved design, 144Hz AMOLED display, and MediaTek Dimensity 7300 chip, priced at Rs 15,999. The phone includes AI features like Ella Voice assistant and Intelligent Signal Hub, along with a 5500mAh battery supporting 45W fast charging and a 64MP main camera.

articles.title: Crnogorski Telekom rolls out smart TV app for Samsung and LG sets
articles.summary: Crnogorski Telekom launched its MagentaTV Smart TV app for Samsung and LG devices. The app provides features like 4K HDR, Dolby Atmos sound, a 14-day rewind function, and personalized recommendations. MagentaTV offers over 230 channels, with more than 95 available in HD.

articles.title: You'll Kick Yourself For Not Buying These 35 Wildly Effective Cleaning Solutions Years Ago
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Several cleaning products are introduced for various household tasks. These include a hard-water stain remover, overnight tank cleaner, Wet & Forget shower cleaner, Levoit air purifier, biodegradable foaming garbage disposal cleaner, Chom Chom roller, mold and mildew remover gel, watermark remover cloth, Goo Gone kitchen degreaser, bathroom cleaner, bug remover, dryer lint brush, washing machine cleaning tablets, multipurpose melamine sponges, leather conditioner, ceiling fan carbon filter, jetted tub cleaner, microfiber wand, microfiber duster set, scratch-free scraper tool, fabric defuzzer, duster sponges, reusable mop pads, The Pink Stuff, chainmail scrubber, pumice cleaning stone, K-Cup cleaning pods, tile pen, Sunny & Honey Carpet Miracle Cleaner, dishwasher cleaning tablets, cooktop-cleaning kit, scrubbing attachments, scour paste, brush cleaning kit and descaling solution.

articles.title: LG HelloVision, 2030 Youth, 10,000 won per month,
articles.author: Luis Mendoza
articles.summary: LG HelloVision has launched 'Uncycle High Speed Internet', a new flexible internet service designed for young adults aged 18-39, available from this month to the end of November. The service offers options like 160Mbps for $19.80 per month, providing significant savings and no termination penalties, addressing the need for flexibility and affordability within the 2030 generation.

articles.title: GirlStyle Unveils Inaugural 'GirlStyle NextGen Glowing Awards 2025,' Illuminating the Future of Beauty
articles.author: 美通社
articles.summary: PressLogic's GirlStyle successfully concluded the 'GirlStyle NextGen Glowing Awards 2025', celebrating pioneers in the beauty sector and awarding innovative brands. TECNO unveiled the POVA 7 Series, featuring significant performance and design advancements.

articles.title: Meghan Markle fuels excitement for As Ever's new products with surprise photo
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: As Ever is launching new 'summer drop' products on June 20th. Meghan Markle, is promoting the launch of the new product line. The initial products launched in April 2025 quickly sold out, and the new release includes both restocked favorites and 'delicious surprises.'

articles.title: Meghan Markle shares new snap and huge update ahead of highly-anticipated launch
articles.author: Jasmine Allday
articles.summary: Meghan Markle's company, As Ever, is preparing to launch new products. This launch follows the initial batch of products that sold out quickly.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Pictures Leaked, Expected Launch On July 9
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Samsung is anticipated to unveil the Galaxy Z Fold 7 at a Galaxy Unpacked event on July 9. Leaked images indicate the phone will come in Blue Shadow and Jet Black, with a possible Ultra version featuring enhanced performance and premium materials. The Z Fold 7 is expected to be slimmer and lighter than its predecessor, with larger screens and improved AI features.

articles.title: Review: 2025 BYD eMax 7 Superior Captain
articles.summary: BYD launched the eMax 7, its first MPV in the Philippines, during the 2025 Manila International Auto Show. The eMax 7 is a pure electric vehicle with a 71.8kWh battery pack and a claimed range of up to 530km, retailing for P1,798,000. It aims to compete with the Toyota Innova Zenix hybrid.

articles.title: New Samsung Galaxy may finally match its closest Android rival in one key way
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to launch the Galaxy Z Flip 7 soon, potentially alongside the Z Fold 7. Leaked renders suggest improvements to the cover display, addressing a current weakness compared to competitors like the Motorola Razr 50 Ultra and Razr 60 Ultra which have larger external displays.

articles.title: 2025 GWM Tank 500 Vanta prices: Chrome-heavy large SUV gets stripped of its bling
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: CarExpert is offering hundreds of new car deals. Customers can browse these deals now to potentially find a great price.

articles.title: Today's NYT Mini Crossword Clues and Answers for June 20, 2025
articles.author: Noah
articles.summary: The New York Times (NYT) introduced "NEWTV" as an "Electronics upgrade for the living room." It is described as a common household upgrade, especially with streaming platforms requiring better visuals and smart features.

articles.title: Myntra launches 'M-Now' fast delivery service in Delhi-NCR, Mumbai
articles.summary: Myntra has expanded its 'M-Now' fast delivery service to Delhi-NCR and Mumbai after a successful pilot in Bengaluru. The expansion is supported by a network of over 40 dark stores and aims to meet the growing demand for fast fashion, with Myntra considering further expansion into other markets.

articles.title: Carex Re-launches with New Identity, Expanded Portfolio in Nigeria
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: PZ Cussons has relaunched its Carex product in Nigeria. The relaunch includes a new Masterbrand identity and an expanded portfolio of Carex products.

articles.title: LG Will Unveil Exclusive Summer Savings to Elevate Every Moment of the Season
articles.summary: LG Electronics is launching a series of exclusive seasonal offers and discounts on its home appliances and entertainment products. These promotional offers are designed to enhance the summer experience, featuring products like air conditioners, smart TVs, refrigerators, and washing machines, all aimed at providing a smarter and more enjoyable lifestyle.

articles.title: Batman Begins: Batsuit Reveal Upset Execs
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Warner Bros. executives initially doubted the new Batsuit design for 'Batman Begins', which aimed for enhanced performance and a tactical aesthetic. The Batsuit, designed by Lindy Hemming, featured segmented armor, enhanced functionality, and incorporation of tech. Despite initial concerns, the Batsuit became a resounding success, influencing future superhero costumes and merchandise sales.

articles.title: HUAWEI launches the nova Y73
articles.author: Jonathan Castillo
articles.summary: HUAWEI has announced the launch of their new budget-friendly phone, the nova Y73, priced at P9,999. The phone features a 6620mAh battery with 40W charging, a 6.67-inch screen with 90Hz refresh rate, and boasts durability, including fall and pressure resistance. It is available on Shopee, Lazada, TikTok, and HUAWEI stores.

articles.title: 30 TikTok Products That Are Actually Worth The Investment
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: COSRX introduced Snail Mucin 96% Power Repairing Essence for skin rejuvenation. Bissell launched a multipurpose carpet and upholstery cleaner for stain removal. Sol de Janeiro released Brazilian Bum Bum Cream enriched with caffeine, guarana extract, and coconut oil. First Aid Beauty launched KP Bump Eraser Body Scrub Exfoliant to exfoliate rough patches and dry bumps. Yonanas introduced fruit soft serve maker that transforms any frozen fruit into an ice cream or sorbet texture.

articles.title: Amazon Prime Shopping days are LIVE: Up to 60% off on water purifiers from Aquaguard, Pureit and more
articles.summary: LG, Samsung, BenQ, Acer, ViewSonic, and MSI will offer UHD 4K monitors in 2025. These monitors will provide sharp visuals, wide viewing angles, and eye comfort, featuring diverse options for work, entertainment, and multitasking.

articles.title: Kioxia Broadens 8th Generation BiCS FLASH™ SSD Portfolio with High-Performance Data Center NVMe™ SSDs to Maximize GPU Utilization in AI and HPC (High-performance computing) Workloads
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Kioxia Corporation announced the prototype development and demonstration of its new KIOXIA CD9P Series PCIe 5.0 NVMe SSDs. These SSDs are built with Kioxia's 8th generation BiCS FLASH TLC-based 3D flash memory, featuring CBA technology. The new flash memory doubles the capacity available per SSD compared with the previous generation model.

articles.title: Genesis GV80 Hybrid coming in 2026
articles.author: James Wong
articles.summary: Genesis plans to debut its new hybrid drivetrain in the GV80 SUV in late 2026. This introduction represents an update to the GV80's powertrain options.

articles.title: Carex Re-launches with New Identity, Expanded Portfolio in Nigeria
articles.author: Nigeria
org: National Association of Nigerian Nurses and Midwives
articles.summary: PZ Cussons has re-launched Carex in Nigeria with a new master brand identity and an expanded portfolio of antibacterial solutions, including handwash, bar soaps, and antiseptic liquids.  The re-launch aims to promote everyday hygiene and germ protection for Nigerian families, emphasizing the brand's commitment to killing over one million germs per second while being gentle on the skin.

articles.title: SSG Landers (CEO Kim Jae-seop, hereinafter SSG) will host "Nuz Brand Day" with color makeup brand Nu..
articles.author: Kim Won-Ik
articles.summary: SSG Landers and Nuse are launching a collaboration product line consisting of Landers X Nuzz Care Tone-up Handy, Landers X Nuzz Moose Care Cheek Handy, and Nuzz Reju Care Lip Gloss, along with related goods like baseball key rings and pouches. The products will be available for pre-sale online from June 25th and at Landers Shop locations from June 27th.

articles.title: Samsung Foldable Challenge: China Leads in Market Race
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung is developing the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7, expected to launch in July 2025, with thinner and lighter designs, wider displays, and improved hinge technology. Anticipated features include enhanced durability, improved display technology, and software optimization. The company aims to retain its leading position in the market by offering these advancements.

articles.title: China's "618" shopping festival shifts focus to quality amid policy-driven upgrades
articles.author: People Daily
articles.summary: JD.com is leveraging AI to instantly generate try-on videos. This allows customers to visualize outfits on different models and in various scenes, enhancing the online shopping experience.

articles.title: Smiths News Recycle- Our Growth So Far (Smiths News plc)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Smiths News expanded its service to non-Smiths News customers, including all aspects of Dry Mixed Recycling. This service takes advantage of the company's early morning network.

articles.title: Model Context Protocol provides the the interconnection for AI work.
articles.author: Adrian Bridgwater
articles.summary: Cloudinary has launched its Cloudinary Model Context Protocol Server, which enables AI agents to interact with Cloudinary's image and video APIs. Ctera now offers native support for MCP, allowing enterprises to connect LLMs directly to private data on its hybrid cloud platform, enhancing security and compliance.

articles.title: Great AI Needs Great (Synthetic) Data
articles.author: Jennifer Chase
articles.summary: SAS executive Jennifer Chase highlights the potential of synthetic data generation for marketers. This technology can create artificial datasets mirroring real customer data, addressing privacy concerns, mitigating bias, and reducing data-related expenses. Synthetic data helps in improving overall marketing effectiveness.

articles.title: Handy Andy Bulk & Junk Removal Services . United States,California,Hollywood, Waste Management Company
articles.author: Scrap Monster
org: Handy Andy Bulk & Junk Removal Services
articles.summary: Handy Andy launched Bulk & Junk Removal Services. This service focuses on removing bulk items and junk.

articles.title: ‘Super Robot Wars Y' Gets Ready For Its August Release
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Super Robot Wars Y will be released in August. A new trailer showcases the game's features.

articles.title: Fark Weird News Quiz - June 20, 2025 (Hard Version)
articles.summary: Gucci introduced the "Printed GG Cotton Jacquard Shirt" as part of its Pre-Fall 2025 collection. This shirt features a printed red horizontal stripes on their custom jacquard pattern and is priced at $2,730.
